name: Labyrinth Sprinter
description:
Fight your way through an unrelenting Dungeon and become the strongest hero!

Labyrinth Sprinter is a roguelike adventure game, where the player must explore each layer of a never-ending dungeon. Fight your way through and claim victory, or fall and be forgotten like the rest.

The game was developed as part of the Mini Jam: Week 74 by James Smale, Adam Veasey and Hugo Bailey

The assets used were created by Vryel

The music used was made by Pix

Controls:
  • A - Turn left
  • X - Turn right
  • SPACE - Move forwards
  • B - Throw boomerang
  • P - Swing sword
  • ESC. - Close game
